$llm_summary.value: Yoga is a collection of physical, mental, and spiritual practices that originated in ancient India. It encompasses a wide range of schools, practices, and goals within Hinduism, Buddhism, and Jainism. Notable types include Hatha yoga and Rāja yoga.
